table.name: aioa_widget_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `aioa_widget_settings` ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT primary key NOT NULL, `license_key` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `color` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `position` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `icon_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `icon_size` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `is_validkey` int(11) NOT NULL default '0' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
